s:workflowdescription.author: Alan R Williams
s:workflowdescription.title: Split string into string list by regular expression - character regex

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: The split string into string list by regular expression takes the string 'boo:and:foo' and using the specified regular expression 'o' splits it into the list ['b','',':and:f']
